title: Grandparent's School: A Grandma and Grandpa Adventure with Grandkids
description: Grandpa has been at it again! He's made up a school for grandparents where the lessons are suspiciously like being a kid. Grandma and grandchild are off on a fun adventure of discovering just how you can be a great grandparent.This is newest book in the I Love My Grands! series, dedicated to strengthening the bond between grandparents, grandchildren and parents. Previous books in the series are "Hidden Grandma" and "Grandpa is My Superhero"
author: Susan Riehle
